title: WHY IS TENACITY A THING?????
body:
Shouldn't players be punished for overstepping??
Shouldn't champions who stun from fog of war or from fancy flash engages be rewarded with a combo followup?
Many champions, ESPECIALLY control mages RELY on landing their crowd controls. We are in a season where some select champions can go well over 500 movespeed near permanently with one ability. It's already bad enough that it's 100x harder to land skillshots on them when they move that fast but the ONE or TWO times in the game you do finally land the crowd control, they still walk away because of {{item:3111}}  stacked with champion tenacity or rune tenacity.

Like when I play Veigar I have to overstep into the enemies trade range when I catch them with my E wall. I win the trade normally because I can input my Q,W in sync with my stun duration.

When people buy {{item:3111}} for a mere 1100g now suddenly when I catch an enemy with my wall, THEY are the ones moving freely when I'm about to followup with my Q,W combo and I get punished for THEM overstepping into my wall. This is not fucking fair. For 1100g you can pretty much delete my E. I basically only have Q,W, and R to land against someone who is already running permanently at 500+ movespeed.

You want to know what the crowd goes wild over? When someone gets caught and rightfully combo'd for it. {{item:3111}} rewards players WAY too well for only 1100g. It not only makes you 2-3 tiers higher at positioning EVEN THOUGH you get caught the same amount of times, but it also pretty much deletes any control mages ONE reliable crowd control.


Is there even any Item I can buy to restore the duration of my Crowd Control? NOPE. I just have to play 2-3 tiers higher and hope my skillshots can 100 to 0 someone with {{item:3111}} . Or at this point can't even focus that player even though they may be an important target to take down in every fight.

That's the game we play. This is our current status. We have champions who have no escapes and 1 slow ability or 1 stun ability who just become 100% irrelevant the moment someone takes tenacity runes or buys {{item:3111}} . 

Why do you guys bait players into falling in love with a champions lores and skins when that SAME champion becomes irrelevant the moment this item is bought??? There's literally no item that I can build to counter that. All anyone can say is "well you shouldn't have been interested in that champion, just play someone else. It's too bad you invested months of practice into that one champion that looked really cool but yeah, you don't matter in this current Season and possibly the future seasons."



Sincerely, very frustrated and mentally burnt out {{champion:45}}  player from Season 1 who can't keep a single account because he tilts every time someone walks into Veigar Wall and leaves the stunned position BEFORE THE Q W COMBO CAN EVEN DROP...




Edit: I hope CertainlyT ruins the game even more to the point you forum trolls jerking eachother off end up finding another game.

That indirectly means "Play another champion, you were wrong for ever being interested in Veigar to begin with".

Tenacity does not affect displacement effects.

Knock ups, knock backs, suppression, hooks, etc.

Also, not all champions benefit from it. Squishy assassins and ADCs generally do not build it because even a single moment of being stunned is a death sentence and they are better off building straight damage and waiting for the opportune moment to strike.

I've had many games where Yasuo, Zed, or even Fizz will rush {{item:3111}}  because they know it completely removes Veigar's first 3 points of E from the game. Basically as Veigar you only have Q,W, and R at that point.

>What's the counter to tenacity though? 

Champions that dont rely on hitting cc.

>

No it fucking doesn't. People die so quickly in League now that even tenacity doesn't save you from getting caught by the slightest of CCs. Get better at the game and stop complaining that the stat that is meant to counter CC but is piss poor at doing so is somehow bad for the game.

There's not much left for me to get better at. I've pretty much soft-capped on Veigar over 10 years. The only thing I can change at this point is just playing a different champion like everyone suggests (which is really disappointing). Also if a basic combo takes 1 second and the stun duration is reduced to less than that then yes it makes the champion dysfunctional, their crowd control doesn't exist for a low low cost of 1100g. There's no item or rune in the game I can take to restore that duration. It's gone the moment that boot is purchased.

If Tenacity were to be removed, all stuns/etc. would have their base duration lowered. They're balanced around opponents having some Tenacity in the same way that Mundo is balanced around having GW applied to him at all times.

Veigar E at max rank stuns for 2.5 seconds. W hits after 1.25 seconds. Why are you waiting so long to follow up on your combo?

Consider the time it takes to walk forward if you catch someone with wall and they're on the further end of it instead of the closer end. Sometimes players play so flawlessly that realistically they ONLY get caught on the further end of it and realistically that's the make or break window for Veigar in a lot of higher end games where those 1 or 2 opportunities don't really come by at any other moment.
